byline.contributor: Makiko Inoue and Hisako Ueno contributed reporting.

abstract: Renho Murata is elected first female leader of Japan's opposition Democratic Party.

headline.print_headline: Japan’s Main Opposition Party Elects First Female Leader
headline.main: Japan’s Main Opposition Party Elects First Female Leader

snippet: Renho Murata, chosen as head of the Democratic Party, became the third woman to take up a prominent political job in Japan in less than two months....
lead_paragraph: Renho Murata, chosen as head of the Democratic Party, became the third woman to take up a prominent political job in Japan in less than two months.
